notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acsnano.9b05337.
NC size histograms, EDS of NCs before and after CE reaction, absorption spectra of NCs before and after CE, TEM images of NCs after reaction with GaCl 3 and GaCl 3–DPP at 100 °C, HAADF-STEM images and EDS elemental maps of Cu 2– x S NCs after reaction with GaCl 3, detailed description of PED calibration procedure ( PDF)
File showing the results of the DFT calculations (ground-state geometries and bond enthalpies for the phosphine complexes used in our work ( XYZ)
